FAQ

On this page

Features ‚Äã

What Minepanel can do.

Server Management ‚Äã

Multiple servers ‚Äã

Run as many servers as your hardware allows. Each one in its own container.

  • Isolated from each other
  • Start/stop individually
  • Assign CPU and RAM per server

All server types ‚Äã

Vanilla, Paper, Spigot, Purpur, Fabric, Forge, NeoForge, Quilt, Sponge, etc.

Any version ‚Äã

From 1.8 to latest. Snapshots too.

CurseForge modpacks ‚Äã

  1. Get the modpack URL
  2. Paste it
  3. Wait
  4. Done

Monitoring ‚Äã

Status at a glance ‚Äã

  • Running/Stopped/Starting
  • Player count
  • CPU/RAM usage
  • Uptime

Live logs ‚Äã

  • Real-time streaming
  • Errors highlighted in red
  • Search and filter
  • Auto-scroll
  • Download logs

File Management ‚Äã

Built-in file browser:

  • Edit configs (server.properties, etc.)
  • Upload/download files
  • Delete files
  • Works through the browser

Server Control ‚Äã

Basic commands ‚Äã

  • Start
  • Stop
  • Restart
  • Delete

RCON console ‚Äã

Send commands directly:

/say Hello
/op PlayerName
/whitelist add PlayerName
1
2
3

Backups ‚Äã

Automatic backup system:

  • Schedule backups (daily, weekly, etc.)
  • Manual backups anytime
  • Restore from backup
  • Download backup files

Configuration ‚Äã

Server settings ‚Äã

Edit from the UI:

  • Server name and MOTD
  • Max players
  • Difficulty
  • Game mode
  • View distance
  • Online mode
  • PVP
  • Command blocks
  • Flight

Resource limits ‚Äã

  • Memory (RAM)
  • CPU cores
  • Swap memory

Advanced ‚Äã

  • JVM arguments
  • Extra flags
  • Environment variables
  • Custom startup commands

Multi-language ‚Äã

  • English
  • Spanish
  • More coming

Multi-architecture ‚Äã

Works on:

  • x86_64 (Intel/AMD)
  • ARM64 (Raspberry Pi, Apple Silicon)

What's next ‚Äã

Check the roadmap to see what's planned.
